name: rose city rollers littles
sizes_available: nb, xs, s, m, l, xl
notes:
easy roll top socks for the whole family!  six new sizes from newborn up to where the original rose city rollers sizes start make it possible to knit fun, colorful socks for everyone in your life.  this is a great pattern for a beginner sock knitter, and a fun, quick knit for more advanced sock knitters.  no more pastel pink and blue baby gifts, this sock is perfect for super bright variegated, speckled, self striping and tonal yarns, and is a great way to use leftover scraps or mini skeins.
if you are knitting baby gifts i have included a chart of average foot circumference and length by age for a guide.
have fun, and happy knitting!

**sizes**
newborn - 4" (10cm) foot circumference
xs - 4.5" (11.5cm) foot circumference
s - 5" (12.75cm) foot circumference
m - 5.5" (14cm) foot circumference
l - 6" (15.25cm) foot circumference
xl- 6.5" (16.5cm) foot circumference
